statements: SELECT * FROM MonthlyDemand ORDER BY month DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT month, demand FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY demand ASC;
SELECT id, month, demand FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE month = 3;
SELECT month, demand FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY month;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE month IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE month = 3 ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT id, month FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY month ASC, id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT month FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT id, demand FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE month <> 7 ORDER BY id ASC, demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE demand < 50 ORDER BY month DESC, demand ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_demand;
SELECT year, month, demand FROM monthly_demand WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT year, month, demand FROM monthly_demand WHERE month = 6;
SELECT * FROM monthly_average_demand;
SELECT year, average_demand FROM monthly_average_demand WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM monthly_demand WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT year, AVG(average_demand) FROM monthly_average_demand GROUP BY year HAVING AVG(average_demand) > 100;
SELECT year, SUM(demand) FROM monthly_demand GROUP BY year;
SELECT * FROM monthly_demand WHERE demand > 500 ORDER BY year, month;
SELECT year, month, demand FROM monthly_demand WHERE year = 2021 AND month IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_demand_metrics WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 10;
SELECT month, year, demand FROM monthly_demand_metrics WHERE month < 9 ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC;
SELECT AVG(average_demand) AS avg_demand FROM monthly_demand_results;
SELECT * FROM monthly_demand_errors WHERE error_code LIKE 'ERR%' AND error_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT error_code FROM monthly_demand_errors ORDER BY error_code ASC;
SELECT month, year, demand FROM monthly_demand_metrics WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT year, month, demand FROM monthly_demand_metrics WHERE year = 2021 AND demand > 100 ORDER BY month;
SELECT month, year, average_demand FROM monthly_demand_results WHERE average_demand BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM monthly_demand_errors WHERE error_code LIKE 'ERR%' ORDER BY error_code;
SELECT year, AVG(demand) AS average_demand FROM monthly_demand_metrics GROUP BY year ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_demand;
SELECT month_name, demand FROM monthly_totals WHERE total_demand > 10000;
SELECT month_name, average_demand FROM monthly_averages ORDER BY average_demand DESC;
SELECT month_name, total_demand FROM monthly_totals WHERE total_demand BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT month_name, min_demand, max_demand FROM monthly_summary WHERE month_name LIKE '%Aug%';
SELECT * FROM monthly_demand ORDER BY demand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT month_name, total_demand, average_demand FROM monthly_totals, monthly_averages WHERE monthly_totals.month_name = monthly_averages.month_name;
SELECT month_name, total_demand FROM monthly_totals UNION SELECT month_name, total_demand FROM monthly_averages;
SELECT month_name, MIN(min_demand), MAX(max_demand) FROM monthly_summary GROUP BY month_name ORDER BY MAX(max_demand) DESC;
SELECT month_name, total_demand FROM monthly_totals WHERE total_demand > (SELECT AVG(total_demand) FROM monthly_totals);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_item_id, product_id, item_price, quantity FROM order_items WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MONTH(order_date) AS month, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY MONTH(order_date) ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
